string-array.name: quote2
string-array.item: The difference between stumbling blocks and stepping stones is how you use them
If someone tells you, You cannot they really mean, I cannot
Whatever you want to do, do it now. There are only so many tomorrows
When I do good, I feel good. When I do bad, I feel bad. That’s my religion
The difference in winning and losing is most often not quitting
You are never too old to set another goal or dream a new dream
All things are difficult before they are easy
Success is falling nine times and getting up ten
Happiness, like unhappiness, is a proactive choice
When the world pushes you to your knees, you’re in the perfect position to pray
If you can change your mind, you can change your life
Happiness often sneaks in through a door you didn’t know you left open
The best way to gain self-confidence is to do what you are afraid to do
Minds are like flowers, they only open when the time is right
Sometimes when you lose your way, you find YOURSELF
You do not have to be good at something to be liked
No matter whether you believe in luck or chance, the final decision is from yourself
Thoughts Become Things,Choose The Good Ones
Never run from the enemy, tackle them
Inaction creates nothing. Action creates success
Believing in negative thoughts is the single greatest obstruction to success
Poverty: a temporary financial low, curable by money
Think big thoughts but relish small pleasures
Success does not come to you; you go to it
A person today who seems to have a great sense of self-esteem has his or her childhood days to thank for it
You willed yourself to where you are today, so will yourself out of it
What we perceive about ourselves is greatly a reflection of how we will end up living our lives
A barrier is a limitation only when you perceive it as one
If you say you can or you cannot you are right either way
Positive energy is attracted to positive energy
The failure to think positively can weigh on a cancer patient like a second disease
If practice makes you perfect should not good behavior be added to the curriculum
Flexibility requires an open mind and a welcoming of new alternatives
The goal is to learn to be nurturing with yourself so you can feel free
Flexibility requires an open mind and a welcoming of new alternatives
The goal is to learn to be nurturing with yourself so you can feel free
The truth is that you are innately good, wise, and powerful. You were created in and for good
Every goal first started as something in our mind. You have it all within you
Beliefs that are good promote your potential and enhance your unique special qualities
Doctor, I appreciate your diagnosis, but I will not accept your verdict
The mind is the mine of man, wherein he digs out good or evil
Catch sunbeams in a mirror. A reflection of a sunbeam can melt an iceberg
Well, if it can be thought, it can be done, a problem can be overcome
Accept yourself: flaws, quirks, talents, secret thoughts, all of it, and experience true liberation
Create your best life with your consciously chosen thoughts, words, and actions
Do not be victim of life-negative religions. Be respectful to life, love and beauty
Be your own hero. Be smart
A positive attitude influences our behavior and dictates a successful approach
Imagination is a timeless possibilities.You attract to you what you have always imagine
Real life is the days we are going to live, not the days we lived
Sometimes you literally need some pressure on your shoulder, to fetch the best in you
Whatever you do keep moving forward
Ambition is like a plague that can only be cured by success
Nothing is hurt unless you are negative thinker
Revolution starts within our own heart, not on the street
When you are in a fix, often the fix is in you
Surround yourself with positive people
We must be willing to expand the heart in order to be able to expand our thinking
Hope makes the dream a possibility
Success is a state of mind. Think great and you will be great
Positive thinking, daring life
Look forward with confidence and backwards with attitude
A gratitude prayer a day keeps stinkin thinkin away
Master the mind with positive thoughts and affirmations
Whatever you do,keep moving forward
Purpose is to touch the life and hearts of others without stepping on others
The mindset you have, determines the next step you take
You can make a living by passing others up, you’ll make a killing by helping others up
The only tension that gets my attention, is when I stick a fork too close to my silver filling
Make yourself feel good. Be enthusiastic about your day
Life is a gift, aim for the sky
You can go as far as you think, imagine and dream. Anything is possible
Courage is being who you are.Courage is sacred of thyself
I dwell on endless possibilities
Pursue great things.You are destiny for greatness
Our thoughts create our future
A gratitude prayer a day keeps stinkin thinkin away
From yearning and wanting to grace and gratitude is a simple shift in belief and attitude
You can make a living by passing others up, you’ll make a killing by helping others up
Be positive. Be true. Be kind
I dwell on great thoughts
Good things happen in your life when you surround yourself with positive people
Purpose is to touch the life and hearts of others without stepping on others
Dare to dwell on great thoughts, you will be great
Find your path, Live your journey, Transform your Life
Sitting around fools increases your tolerance
Mind is a flexible mirror, adjust it, to see a better world
Maybe being broken helps you become a better person
Each day has the potential of being your best day. You decide what each day will bring
All roads out of hell lead home
Never say anything about yourself you do not want to come true
To change your life, you need to become aware of yourself
Focus on what you can do right now, not what you cannot do right now
If you are opportunist, then you are already one step closer to achieve your target
I am a glass of Positivity; If you drink it,you will always find positives in you
AIM BIG,THINK DEEP,WORK HARD,YOU WIN
Be Positive. Be Passionate. Be Persistent. Be Poetic
Some positive thinkers get consistent powerful results almost deserving of a scientific formula
Being powerful means shifting our minds away from our troubles and into solution-thinking
There is no reason to worry I started brand new story
Never say anything about yourself you do not want to come true
Change the way you think and you will change the way you feel
You will be surrounded by negativity but you shall overcome it with positivity
As architect of your reality, you are empowered to create it as you choose
Gratitude is more of a compliment to yourself than someone else
Always look at the positive side of life
Think positively.Always focus on the positive side of any situation
Flow with the go
Daily love and kindness are the path to a happy life
A kind thought, word, or action creates infinite ripples of caring, consideration, and peace
Sometimes being happy takes effort. Invest time and energy in yourself and your happiness
i never give up, i will try and try when my goal reaches
When the positive mind takes the lead, the legs are safe to follow without any shaking
When your bright future, becomes a dull regret of the past, take a deep breath and move on
You can do anything you set your mind to
There is no truth beyond perception. How you look at things is the truth for you
An affirmation opens the door. It’s a beginning point on the path to change
Constant repetition carries conviction
Affirmation without discipline is the beginning of delusion
I figured that if I said it enough, I would convince the world that I really was the greatest
Belief consists in accepting the affirmations of the soul; unbelief, in denying them
You become what you think about most of the time
Every action and feeling is preceded by a thought
The ancestor of every action is a thought
As a man thinks in his heart, so is he
